description: Detects the first occurrence of a modification to Group Policy Object Attributes to add privileges to user accounts or use them to add users as local admins.
name: Group Policy Abuse for Privilege Addition
query: winlog.channel:Security AND (winlog.event_data.AttributeLDAPDisplayName:gPCMachineExtensionNames AND (winlog.event_data.AttributeValue:(*827D319E\-6EAC\-11D2\-A4EA\-00C04F79F83A* OR *803E14A0\-B4FB\-11D0\-A0D0\-00A0C90F574B*)) AND event.code:5136)
author: Elastic, Josh Nickels, Marius Rothenb√ºcher
false_positives: Users allowed to perform these modifications (user found in field SubjectUserName)
